sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-dialog
        v-model="show"
        max-width="500px">
        <v-form
            ref="form">
            <v-btn
                tile
                depressed
                class="secondary"
                @click="show = false">
            </v-btn>
        </v-form>
    </v-dialog>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: TestDialog,
    // emits: {
    //     input(value) {
    //         // return `true` or `false` to open or close dialog
    //     }
    // },
    data() {
        return {
            props: {
                data: Object,
                value: Boolean
            }
        }
    },
    computed: {
        show: {
            get() {
                return this.value
            },
            set(value) {
                this.$emit('input', value)
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>
